oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Slavery the Issue"
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fred Wright
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Labor History, War, Economy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: First Panel: Slaves working in a field. Second Panel: Abolitionists tearing down posters about runaway slaves. Third Panel: Slaves entering a white family's home.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Fred Wright Original Cartoons (Subgroup 13.1), Fred Wright Papers (UE.13)
